mapper.select: select m.MEMBER_NICK, d.diary_date, e.emoji, d.contents, d.DIARY_SEQ from diary d join emotions e on e.EMOTION_SEQ = d.EMOTION_SEQ join member m on d.MEMBER_EMAIL = m.member_email where d.MEMBER_EMAIL = #{myEmail}

select m.MEMBER_NICK, d.diary_date, e.emoji, d.contents, d.DIARY_SEQ from diary d join emotions e on e.EMOTION_SEQ = d.EMOTION_SEQ join member m on d.MEMBER_EMAIL = m.member_email where d.MEMBER_EMAIL in (select MEMBER_OP_EMAIL from friend_apply where MEMBER_EMAIL = #{myEmail}) and diary_private = 'n' order by d.diary_seq desc

select rownum, m.MEMBER_NICK, d.diary_date, e.emoji, d.contents, d.DIARY_SEQ from diary d join emotions e on e.EMOTION_SEQ = d.EMOTION_SEQ join member m on m.member_email = d.MEMBER_EMAIL where d.DIARY_SEQ in (select CEIL(DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE(0, (select max(DIARY_SEQ) from diary)))DIARY_SEQ from DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 20000) and d.diary_private = 'n' and rownum <= 10
select * from diary d LEFT JOIN bgimage i on d.bgimg_seq = i.bgimg_seq JOIN emotions e on d.emotion_seq = e.emotion_seq where d.diary_seq = #{diarySeq}
